runs.comm: oh ho, full delivery, Gambhir flashes at it, there's a noise and the ball drops just short of Adam Gilchrist!
back of a length, moving away from off stump, Gambhir gets across and leaves well enough alone
too wide, moving away, and it allows Gambhir to throw the bat it, slashing it at some pace off the bat and up and over backward point for India's first runs, beating Bracken running across
better ball, tighter line and length just around off stump, but thats equally good stuff from Gambhir, just tapping it near his feet and responding well to Sehwag's call for the quick single
just back of a length outside off, Sehwag stands leaden-footed and has a go, but misses completely
fuller ball, on off stump, Sehwag gets behind it and pushes back to Lee, who collects and feigns a throw back at the stumps, electric atmosphere at Durban
good ball on off stump, tight length, again Gambhir gets behind it and pushes softly to the off side, then runs for the quick single and Bracken runs down and kicks the ball near the stumps
full but down leg stump, a hint of swing, Sehwag mistimes the shot, off the pads, to square leg
good length down leg stump, tucked to square leg, the runner wants the run but Gambhir doesnt, a bit of a mix-up but he manages to make his ground
tight stuff again, straight ball on the stumps, Gambhir shuffles in his crease but cant put it away on the leg side
back of a length, comes into Gambhir, who pokes at it and gets a leading edge safely through the vacant gully region
back of a length again, off stumpish, Sehwag stands up and just pushes towards point, there's further hesitation between the runners but they get a single in the end
short of a length on middle and leg, sits up and forces Sehwag up on the toes, he plays it to leg, Lee steams in and collects and has some advice for Sehwag
slower delivery this time, close to a yorker outside off stump, well picked and driven into the covers, where Symonds fields and cuts off any thoughts of a single
good ball, right on a length with no room to work with and Sehwag gets behind the line, defending to Symonds in the covers again
short ball just outside off stump and Sehwag does well to get tall and drop it to the leg side, with soft hands, and Gambhir and Sharma scamper the single as Lee runs across and fields
fuller delivery on middle and leg, Gambhir tries to work it away but gets an inside-edge onto his pads
full outside off stump, Gambhir goes for a streaky square-drive but cant beat Symonds in the covers
full, clubbed back down the ground, Johnson at mid-on does well to stop it
back of a length, strikes Gambhir on the pads but its doing too much and looks high over the stumps, the ball parries towards point
back of a length, just enough width for Gambhir to slash that on the rise through the gap at backward point for four
back of a length again, this time he taps it away but fails to beat either point or backward point
holds back the length, gets it to move but Gambhir pokes at it and gets it all along the ground, and with slip not there anymore thats four, looked intentional
back of a length outside off stump, this time Gambhir shoulders arms
back of a length on leg stump, tucked away for one
good length, tapped in front of point gently and Gambhir responds well to Sharma's call for the sharp single
short of a length on leg stump, Sehwag shuffles and works it fine for another single
back of a length on middle and leg, Gambhir is tucked for room as he tries the gentle push and ends up mistiming it to backward point
back of a length on middle and off, again he cant work it for a single, tapping it to backward point once more
banged in shorter this time and Gambhir immediately gets into position, pulling over midwicket, a couple of bounces and thats four
shot! The ball's full and just a tad wide, but more than enough for Sehwag to stand and square-drive that smack through the two point fielders

but he's gone now! Johnson bowls this one back of a length, the ball sits up more than Sehwag expected, and he gets an outside-edge going for a slash over point, cramped for room, and Gilchrist gleefully takes it
back of a length, great channel, Uthappa pokes at it and gets an edge, but it dies before Hayden at slip and runs away
back of a length on the stumps, Gambhir gets up and tucks it fine, runs very well and collects a single
back of a length outside off stump, pushed to Haddin at point
just a tad full and wide and Uthappa's onto it in style, coming forward and driving through the covers
back of a length outside off stump, gingerly pushed to point and he calls for the run, Clarke swoops in and has lots of time to hit the nonstriker's end but throws way over them
good length, again no room to work with, Uthappa gets forward and pushes to cover
slower ball, on a length, drawing Uthappa forward and he gets a leading-edge that bobs up and falls short of mid-off
dropped! Uthappa gets slightly cramped for room as he slashes one, it flies quick, high and fast to Clarke at backward point, who dives up and gets fingers on it but cant hold on
back of a length outside off stump, poked to point
back of a length on off stump this time and Gambhir pokes it wide of point for a quick single, good running between the wickets from India
back of a length on middle and leg, worked through midwicket for one
fullish delivery, Uthappa drives well to Symonds in the covers
slower ball, on a length, which stops on Uthappa who checks his shot and the ball pops up and falls safely in front of cover
back of a length, not really enough room to cut and Uthappa steers it to Clarke at backward point, and then has to react quickly to send Gambhir back, there was no single on offer there
identicaly delivery, but this time Uthappa smartly runs it down to Lee at third man for one

what a catch! Johnson bowls it short, Gambhir swivels and connects well with the pull, the ball's flying hard and flat for six but Brad Hodge covers good ground, then realizes he's overrun himself, moves back and holds onto a very, very good catch to send him back! Immense effort and Australia have picked up their second wicket
and he's welcomed by a short delivery outside off stump, beaten
hello and goodbye! Yuvraj swivels and slams a short delivery rows back over deep square leg, what a way to get off the mark
slower ball, outside off, he mistimes his drive but gets one into the covers
back of a length on the stumps, Uthappa comes onto the front foot and looks to work it away but cant beat the fielder at midwicket
movement off the pitch as Uthappa lunges forward and gets beaten outside off stump, something of a leg-cutter from Clark
good length outside off, again he comes forward and this time steers it to Clarke at point
fullish length, driven back to Lee's left, bowler collects and almost throws it back to Yuvraj, who hustles back into his crease
top shot, Yuvraj driving a full delivery smack back down the ground, Johnson dives across from mid-on and saves it on the ropes, Hussey does the back-up work and thats good fielding
good length, driven tall to Symonds in the covers, who fields and has a shy at the stumps, hitting and giving away a single courtesy the ricochet
full, aiming for the yorker, Uthappa manages to get bat on it, the ball squeezes through his legs past short fine leg, he runs well and gets two to his name
overpitched and thats hit very hard down to Hussey at long-off
wow! Lee pitches full on middle and leg and Yuvraj nonchalantly flicks that way over deep backward square for half a dozen! Nothing more than a dismissive pick-up shot!
short of a length and outside the off, played down to the third-man region
full and on the pads, Yuvraj picks that one up off his toes and whips it over midwicket. One bounce and over the ropes. Quality hitting here from Yuvraj
short of a good length and outside the off, cut away in front of point
short ball banged in, Uthappa rocks back and pulls that magnificently. In front of square and very high, the ball sails into the stands at midwicket
worked through the on side for a single

Clout! another one dropped just a touch and Yuvraj pulls viciously. The ball disappears over the ropes and over the stands. That is a mighty blow from Yuvraj who appears in incredible touch. That ball landed on the roof.
fullish and on the pads, a bit of swing in, defensive shot played, the ball runs down towards fine-leg
very full and on the pads, Bracken aiming for the yorker, punched down towards long-on
slower ball on the off, Uthappa waits on it and plays it down towards point with soft hands
full and on the off, Yuvraj backs away to the leg side and carves that inside out and through cover. One bounce and over the ropes. This one went off the meant of the bat
very full and on the off, dug out towards short third-man
short of a length and on the pads, clipped to the leg side for a single
full and on the off, not much pace on that, played back down to the bowler
full and a touch too straight, worked into the leg side, the batsmen think about a single but decide against it as Hayden throws
very full and on the off, Symonds bowling offbreaks now, clipped down towards backward square-leg
thumped through square-leg
fullish and on the off, driven down to long-off for a single to end a solid comeback over from Symonds
Shot! low full-toss outside the off, Yuvraj carves this one inside out over cover. Haddin jumps up on the ropes but can't quite reach it and the ball sails over
short of a length and down the leg side, flick played and missed
full and on the pads, Clark following Yuvraj as he backs away to leg, clipped into the on side, good running gets the batsman two
short of a good length and on the stumps, clouted over the infield, Hayden runs in at deep midwicket and dives but just can't hold onto the catch
full and on the pads, flicked down towards fine-leg, the man at square-leg has to run around and field
Whack! short of a length and outside the off, this one just sits up and Yuvraj waits on the ball and pulls magnificently for six. That's 50 off only 21 balls for Yuvraj
full-toss outside the off stump, Yuvraj waits on this one and just slaps it for four in front of point. This is some hitting from Yuvraj. Unstoppable at the moment
Big one! Uthappa walks down the pitch and crashes this one over long-off. That is a huge hit from Uthappa who has the audacity to give the bowler the charge. That is a really massive hit.
Another! short one banged in and Uthappa was waiting for that. He was in position really quickly and hits it in front of midwicket. That is another huge hit

Full and straight. Driven really hard towards cover. Andrew Symonds half fields that one. The ball goes just wide of him. Uthappa wants the single and has come down the pitch. Symonds grabs the ball and looks for the keeper. Gilchrist is not in position behind the stumps yet. Symonds lines the stumps up and throws them down with a rocket.
full and outside the off, driven through cover, Dhoni is under way
full and on the pads, Yuvraj flicks uppishly towards deep backward square-leg. Haddin does well to field that one
fullish and on the stumps, a rare defensive shot as the ball is dabbed to the on side
full and on the leg stump. Yuvraj gives himself some room and drives down to long-on
fullish and on the off, it's that trademark whip shot from Dhoni and it's hit so powerfully hard that long-on has no chance
here's another one. Slightly short and Dhoni quickly goes back, swivels and pulls in front of square
driven down to long-off
again Yuvraj gives himself room, again Symonds sends a full-toss in outside off. Yuvraj carves the ball over the fielder at cover
yorker on the off stump, tough to hit that, dug out back to the bowler
full and on the stumps, Dhoni somehow whips out that attempted yorker. The ball goes away down towards long-on. Remarkable shot that
slower ball this time, Dhoni goes for the pull but does not mis-hit it, the ball is in the air but falls in no man's land
full, fast and quite straight. Lee powering in the yorker, it's just outside the off stump, Yuvraj plays and misses
another yorker, again pacy, Yuvraj jams the ball out down towards short third-man
very full and just slipping down leg, flicked down towards square-leg
slower ball, Yuvraj sees it a bit late and checks his shot, chipped back over the bowler down towards long-on
full and on the stumps, driven down towards long-on
Take that! Clarke comes round the stumps to Yuvraj who plants one foot down the ground and hits that ball oh-so-sweetly over midwicket. That is a terrific hit that goes all the way

Yuvraj tries to repeat the stroke and this time does not quite get hold of the ball. The ball sails high and towards midwicket but does not have enough on it to clear Michael Hussey. End of a terrific innings from Yuvraj and Gilchrist's gamble with bowling Clarke has paid off
played down towards long off
Bang! It's Dhoni time! He gets under this one and whips it with immense power over long-on. It's flat but has enough to go all the way. Big over for India despite the fall of the wicket
slower ball, on the stumps, Rohit digs this back down the pitch
another slower ball, steered down towards third-man for a single
Huge heave! That is a monstrous blow. Dhoni comes down the pitch and brutally muscles this over midwicket. That is pure power all the way and it clears the ropes
slower ball this time, Dhoni waits on it and smacks that behind square on the leg side. That is a cracking shot
fullish and on the off, Dhoni hits it hard into the ground and the ball goes down towards long-off
Up, up and away! Now it's Rohit Sharma's turn. He moves to leg and heaves the ball over long-on. That's not brutally hit but rather timed impeccably
short one banged in, good pace, Dhoni comes down the pitch and agriculturally slashes this one, the ball goes over the infield and lands safe
short one banged in once more, again Dhoni comes down the pitch and this time he pulls over the leg side
slightly slower, Dhoni has a swing and a miss, Rohit wants the bye and charges down the pitch, he's sent back, Johnson fields and has a shy but Rohit is back
full and straight, good attempted yorker that, Dhoni digs the ball out, Johnson fields in his followthrough as a single is scampered
slower ball just outside the off, Rohit moves to leg and has a massive heave but misses. Dhoni takes off for the bye but is short of his crease as Gilchrist throws down the stumps with a direct hit

short of a length and outside the off, Pathan has a heave across the line, off the body down past Gilchrist and to the fence. There's no chance for the fielder and it's four leg-byes. India end on a very very healthy 188 from their 20 overs
